articles.author: Zahid Mahmood
articles.title: At least 60 migrants feared dead in Cape Verde boat disaster - CNN
articles.description: At least 60 migrants are presumed dead after a boat disaster off Cape Verde, West Africa, according to the International Organization on Migration (IOM).
articles.content:
At least 60 migrants are presumed dead after a boat disaster off Cape Verde, West Africa, according to the International Organization on Migration (IOM).
